msbt.message: Ohmigosh, you're not going to believe this, but I was focusing sooo hard on my egg huntI was starting to see eggs and egg patterns everywhere! Even when they weren't there! I guess when that happens it's called the "egg effect" or something.Anyhoo, I decided it was time to take a little break. You know, just chill at home, relax, do some yoga. Maybe you should take a little break too, .Take it from me, you do NOT want to start seeing eggs when you close your eyes, .

Ohmigosh, happy Bunny Day! Did you know Zipper's over at the plaza today? So exciting, right? OK, I'll be honest, he's a littlehow do I put thisunusual. No, wait, let's call him unique! That's it, unique! He's suuuuper bouncy and, wow, talk about high energy!And, sure, maybe he gets kinda skittish when you walk up behind him.But our big yellow buddy does, like, soooo much work to make Bunny Day nice for all of us! I'll admit it, I'm totes a big fan. He's super fab in my book, .

Since today is Bunny Day, I feel like I should write an epic pop song to celebrate it.I mean, ALL the best holidays have their own songs, right? Why not Bunny Day? And ohmigosh! It could be THE hit song that launches me to pop stardom! It's going to be a breeze to write too. Like, sooo many words rhyme with bunny! Funnysunnymoneyhoney See what I mean?I better start writing while I'm totes inspired, .

So, Wilbur gave me some super- weird intel that I promised to keep to myself, but I can't do it. I'm totes going to explode if I don't tell someone. And that someone is YOU! Here goes Wilbur says a certain someone used a Nook Miles Ticket to go on an island tour And while they were there, they hit a rockand that's when an egg popped out. Of the ROCK! Totes weird, right? Even weirder I hear eggs are sometimes popping out of rocks on THIS island too! I'd go check it out myself, but I've got some vocal warm-ups to do.But you should def go see if this whole getting-eggs-from-rocks thing is for real. Let me know what you find out. I prooomise I won't tell anyone, .

The whole island is getting ready for Bunny Day! Isn't it the best?!Want to know why I loooove Bunny Day so much? It's because the WEIRDEST stuff happens! Like, if you stand next to a coconut tree and give it a good smack, a load of wood eggs falls out! Candy eggs growing on trees. That's Bunny Day for you, .

So, , Bunny Day is on this year.I'm telling you this because you need to know I will be OVER-THE-TOP excited the entire time. I mean it! I LOVE everything about Bunny Day! The beautiful eggs, the fab colors, the pop designs And all that CUTENESS!See! Don't say I didn't warn you, !

You are NOT going to believe this. They say if you go after medium fish shadows, you may find an egg!How weird is that? Or maybe that's just to be expected when the magical season of Bunny Day is upon us!
